896279a6-6ed2-47a8-acec-a9974e0fc26a.description: Behavior-based interviewing is a method that rates candidates on the same scale based on the same questions, assessing the behaviors and qualities that will make a candidate an ideal fit for a job opening. a45f3b9a-abd5-4fc5-8520-7493c8ec629c.description: Most people think that "coaching," "mentoring," and "sponsoring" are synonymous. But as this course explains, mentoring and sponsorship involve deeper levels of commitment from you as a manager. Mentoring involves more time, whereas sponsorship encourages you to risk your reputation on behalf of that individual. This course will guide you through the factors to consider and the life-changing impact of investing your time and efforts in a member of your team.
a45f3b9a-abd5-4fc5-8520-7493c8ec629c.name: Knowledge Badge: Mentoring and Sponsorship

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Mentoring and Sponsorship pathway in Vensure University.

e01b7d78-673d-424a-a90c-a1e682a2ddbb.description: Learn the ins and outs of Microsoft OneDrive and SharePoint.

c49cae3e-fbcf-4213-b099-8d8314f9c204.description: Leadership would be easier if you could follow a specific set of instructions that would allow you to achieve your intended results, regardless of the situation or personalities involved. Alas, as we all know, life is complex and so are the leadership skills needed to adapt to it. In this course you'll learn about key leadership qualities, hands on/off approaches to leadership, and learn how to identify leadership skills that work the best with your personality.
c49cae3e-fbcf-4213-b099-8d8314f9c204.name: Knowledge Badge: Leadership Styles

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Leadership Styles pathway in Vensure University.
Passed the final quiz with 80% or better.

6cdaa1b5-e5f1-452c-9cbe-64fbeb362b86.description: This course goes through important steps that employees can take to prevent security breaches and money laundering at our company. There are five variations of this course, each geared toward separate audiences: executives, finance sector, IT staff, managers/VPs, and all employees. All five pathways are located in the Role-Based Compliance Trainings plan.
6cdaa1b5-e5f1-452c-9cbe-64fbeb362b86.name: Knowledge Badge: Cybersecurity and Fraud Prevention

badge_template_activities.title: Completed one of five of the Role-Based Compliance Trainings in Vensure University.

ed14ffbf-eea2-42a4-a5ed-8296e4bdee03.description: The candidate has accepted the job and, with a mix of nervousness and excitement, anxiously awaits their first day. Prior to Day 1, they have received multiple contacts from the department head, their manager, and team. How do you think this will affect our candidates’ first impressions of our company? Take advantage of this time to let our new hires know the value they bring to our teams. Learn how to assuage the “first day jitters” and help your employees adjust to their new work families.
ed14ffbf-eea2-42a4-a5ed-8296e4bdee03.name: Knowledge Badge: Onboarding New Hires

1ca21f93-72c3-4381-b47d-bc3d9c4974f7.description: Diversity is vital for our organization's growth. A diversity of life experiences, backgrounds, beliefs, and identities leads to stronger ideas and a more engaging company culture for our organization. So, if we all know diversity is important, why do most managers struggle with adding more diversity to their teams? In this course, we hope to give you a highly practical guide to recognizing your own biases and addressing diversity issues within your team.
